definition: Slapping the Table in Amazement (Part II), second of two books of vernacular stories by Ming dynasty novelist Ling Mengchu 凌濛初|凌蒙初[Ling2 Meng2 chu1]
pinyin: Er4 ke4 Pai1 an4 Jing1 qi2

definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals
to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
